name: Ashley Holbrook
text: I miss going to this place. They had incredibly good pizza and not to mention it was cheap and always came out really fast. The people who worked there were always really friendly and the whole family just loved the pizza in general.

name: Matthew Kline
text: I hate to give bad reviews but this place earned it. The first bad sign was that the store was very dirty. The chairs, tables and floors had pizza sauce and crumbs all over them. You could tell the place hadn't been cleaned in some time. ‚Ä¶More

text: The empoyees are nice and patient. One male employee walked the pizzas out to the cars and took time to speak to the customers. He give a little personal touch. It was nice

text: My dad went for a pizza that took him more then 30 minutes. When he got to the car he open it and it was like this. Not recomended and undercook and the sides were burn!

text: The best Detroit-style  pepperoni deep dish pizza ever!  Plus you cannot beat the price.  I would give 5 stars for taste and price alone, but the customer service is unpredictable.  Sometimes they seems so lost back there behind that counter, but, I keep going back so...
